prompts: Create a shapeshifting Pokemon that can transform into any creature it sees.
I want a gooey, purple Pokemon that can mimic the appearance of others.
Generate a playful, blob-like creature with a mischievous grin.
Make a Pokemon that can take on the form of its opponents in battle.
Imagine a cute, amorphous Pokemon that loves to surprise its friends.
Design a Pokemon that can change its shape and color at will.
Give me a unique creature that can blend into its environment effortlessly.
